channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [PIG-452] Issues when non existent columns are projected
item.description:
Script:

-- columns x,y,z do not exist
a = load 'st10k' as (name, age, gpa, x, y, z);
b = load 'st10k' as (name, age:chararray, gpa);
c = join a by (name, y), b by (name, age);
dump c;

Error:

item.summary: Issues when non existent columns are projected

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Changed POProject to return STATUS_OK instead of STATUS_NULL.
